<template>
    <header class="header-container">
      <nav>
        <router-link to="/" class="nav-item">Home</router-link>
        <router-link to="/login" class="nav-item">Login</router-link>
        <BoardMenu />
      </nav>
    </header>
</template>

<script>
import BoardMenu from './BoardMenu.vue'

export default {
  name: 'PageHeader',
  components: {
    BoardMenu
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.header-container {
  background-color: #42b983; /* Dark green-blue */
  color: #fff; /* White text */
  padding: 10px; /* Padding for better spacing */
}

.nav-item {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #fff; /* White text */
  font-size: 1.2em; /* Increased font size */
  padding: 10px 20px; /* Padding to make links look like buttons */
  background-color: #333; /* Dark background for contrast */
  border-radius: 5px; /* Rounded corners */
  transition: all 0.3s ease; /* Transition for smooth hover effect */
}

.nav-item:not(:last-child) {
  margin-right: 10px; /* Margin between links */
}

.nav-item:hover {
  color: #42B983; /* Vue.js green for hover state */
  background-color: #fff; /* White background on hover */
  border-radius: 10px;
}

hr {
  border-top: 1px solid #42B983; /* Vue.js green for horizontal line */
}
</style>
